titleInfo.title: The cost of hovering and forward flight in a nectar-feeding bat, Glossophaga Soricina, estimated from aerodynamic theory

bibliographicCitation.default:
Norberg UM, Kunz TH, Steffensen JF, Winter Y, von Helversen O (1993)
Journal of Experimental Biology 182(1): 207-227.
